title.narrative: Young African Leaders Initiative (YALI) - First Business Center

description.narrative: Chad has a poor ICT penetration rate. This comes as a result of limited ICT training and testing centers, few qualified ICT professionals and the lack of inclusion of ICT into Chads educational system. , To address this challenge, in year one, the First Business Center will offer various ICT training to two key population groups: 1) students and teachers and 2) ICT professionals in Chad.
